title: How to Make Raspberry Marinade

steps.headline: Pour all of the ingredients into the glass bowl.
steps.description: Stir to combine. Don't worry about the berries falling apart - that's a good outcome.

steps.headline: Place the food to be marinated in the bowl.
Cover the bowl.
steps.description: Place it into the refrigerator. Leave to marinate for several hours. Turn the food over halfway through.

steps.headline: Cook the food as required by your recipe.
steps.description: When done, the raspberry marinade will have added its own sweet berry flavour.

text: Pour all of the ingredients into the glass bowl. Stir to combine. Don't worry about the berries falling apart - that's a good outcome. Place the food to be marinated in the bowl.  Cover the bowl. Place it into the refrigerator. Leave to marinate for several hours. Turn the food over halfway through. Cook the food as required by your recipe.
